alert.note: Alert for Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 10 at 1:22PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong wind through early this evening, snow showers late tonight and Friday... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service in Riverton. * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to around 50 mph through early this evening. Snow showers late tonight and Friday. Snow accumulations generally under an inch but 2 to 3 inches possible where snow banding sets up. * WHERE...The Wind River Basin. * WHEN...Strong wind through into early this evening, snow showers late tonight and Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Keep two hands on the steering wheel in case of sudden, strong wind gusts. Motorists are urged to watch for snow covered and slick roads as well as rapid changes in visibility if traveling late tonight and Friday.

area.areaDesc: Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin
